Sequence Information.Source: screen from rice genome,Oryza rufipogonGriff, plants

Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that this sequence is similar (37.93%) tocAMP70Activity: active against C. fangi (MIC 37.7 uM), C. michiganensis (MIC 34.6 uM), X. oryzae pv. oryzae (MIC 44.0 uM), R. solanacearum  (MIC 33 uM), X. oryzae pv. oryzicola (MIC 31.4 uM), and B. subtilis 168 (MIC 36.1 uM).MOA:bacteria: act on membranes, ROS release.Toxicity: no hemolysis at 3xMIC or 150 uM: not hemo.lytic.
Literature Information.Author: Li J, Islam S, Guo P, Hu X, Dong W.2020
Literature Information.Reference: Int J Mol Sci. 2020 Nov 18;21(22):8722. doi: 10.3390/ijms21228722.PubMed
Literature Information.Title: Isolation of Antimicrobial Genes from Oryza rufipogon Griff by Using a Bacillussubtilis Expression System with Potential Antimicrobial Activities.
